summary: IN JUNE 2016 I WAS SENT A LETTER STATING MY CAR IS INVOLVED IN A RECALL DUE TO THE AIRBAG INFLATORS. THE RECALL STATES "THE PROPELLANT IN THESE INFLATORS MAY DEGRADE AFTER PROLONGED EXPOSURE TO HIGH ABSOLUTE HUMIDITY AND FLUCTUATING HIGH TEMPERATURES. DEGRADED PROPELLANT CAN CAUSE INFLATORS RUPTURE DURING AIRBAG DEPLOYMENT. IN THE EVENT OF AN INFLATORS RUPTURE, METAL FRAGMENTS COULD PASS THROUGH THE AIRBAG CUSHION MATERIAL, STRIKING THE VEHICLE OCCUPANTS, AND RESULT IN SERIOUS INJURY OR DEATH."  AND SO FAR NO FURTHER COMMUNICATION HAS BEEN SENT AS TO HOW AND WHEN THIS PROBLEM WILL BE REMEDIED. IT SHOULD ALSO BE NOTED THAT I LIVE IN THE MOST PROBLEMATIC ZONE, WHICH IS DESCRIBED IN THE RECALL.
